detail_desc: STUDIO COLLECTION. Suit trousers in twill made from a soft wool blend with a high waist, zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight legs with side stripes and creases.
Knee-length cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband containing a concealed key pocket.

Printed set with a top and pair of joggers. Top in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend in a casual style and relaxed fit with a easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The joggers are made partly from recycled polyester.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Lightly padded cardigan in a quilted organic cotton weave with concealed press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Patterned lining.
Tights with an elasticated waist.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in soft jersey.

Push-up bra in microfibre and satin with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and ties at the hem. Gently dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Fitted dress in stretch velvet with a small stand-up collar, hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist and open back.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit and pair of shorts in an organic cotton blend. Jersey bodysuit with a sewn-on waistcoat and bow tie in woven fabric, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and fake fly.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a fold-up hem.
Smocked bikini top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. No fasteners.
Boots in imitation leather with wedge heels, a loop at the back and a zip at the front. Recycled polyester linings and imitation leather insoles.
Coat in a sturdy wool blend with notch lapels, concealed double buttons at the front, concealed pockets in the side seam and a single back vent. Soft, detachable belt with a metal buckle. Lined.
Treggings in stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets, contrasting colour stripes down the sides and asymmetric raw-edge hems.

detail_desc: Fitted, long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a seam under the bust.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in soft viscose with a rounded collar, lace yoke and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with a button at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.

Sporty jacket in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a chest pocket and roll edges around the neckline and sleeves.
Short skirt in a soft weave with pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back, side pockets and a sewn-in tie belt. Unlined.
Cropped top in soft jersey with raw, rolled edges.
Briefs in soft, stretch silk with lace details, wide lace sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs. The cotton content of the trunks is organic.
Denim jacket with sleeves and a detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric. Press-studs on the hood, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and ribbed cuffs.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Scarf in patterned silk that can also be worn as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Wool trousers in a checked weave with a high waist and wide, gently tapered legs. Extended waistband with a hook-and-eye fastening, button fly, side pockets and a flap back pocket.
Long, jumper in a hole-patterned knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slightly longer, sleeveless top in a soft, stretch, rib-knit viscose blend with a raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Short, 5-pocket, low-rise shorts in soft, superstretch denim that showcase the body’s physique. Zip fly and button and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Padded slippers in soft velour with an embroidered motif and appliqués on the front. Velour linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Fitted top in stretch cotton jersey with a low-cut back and short sleeves.
Shorts woven in a linen blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, two fake back pockets and short slits in the hems.
Leggings in patterned sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist. Pile lining.
Calf-length shirt dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Short pull-on shorts in washed cotton denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and scalloped, broderie anglaise hems.
Pouch in transparent plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size 9x10x18 cm.

Short dress in an airy cotton weave with a small, smocked stand-up collar, V-neck and scalloped short sleeves. Smocking at the waist and a flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Broderie anglaise on the sleeves, front and skirt. Lined skirt.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Short blouse in woven fabric with a small frilled collar, opening and button at the back of the neck and a smocked bodice. Short, elasticated puff sleeves, and a frill trim at the hem.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lace appliqué on the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide legs that taper to the hem.
Jumper knitted in a wool blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with block-coloured sections, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Suit trousers in a stretch wool weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly, low crotch and tapered legs.

V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Cap in cotton twill with an appliqué on the front and ties at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts and a concealed plastic ring at the front. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastening at the back.
Hi-tops in imitation suede with a fold-down edge, adjustable hook and loop tab at the top and elasticated lacing at the front. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fine-knit hat in a soft cotton blend with a roll-edge hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jeggings in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fitted, knee-length lace dress with a V-neck front and back and short cap sleeves. Partly lined.
Sandals with crossover straps in braided straw and narrow wedge heels covered in imitation suede. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Court shoes with pointed toes and block heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Mules with narrow, blunt toes and a decorative strap with a round buckle at the top. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 0.5 cm.

Tube top in ribbed cotton jersey.
Long cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, ribbed bands, patch front pockets and a ribbed hem. No fasteners.
High-waisted lace and microfibre briefs. Wide elastication at the waist with an opening at the back, a lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs.
Jersey-lined, 5-pocket trousers in soft twill with elasticated ribbing at the waist.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Super Skinny Fit – a shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
